ComicInfo.Summary:
DEADPOOL KILLS CABLE Part 2
Deadpool's going back to his vile beginnings as a mercenary and wanted killer. No more being a hero. No more X-Men. No more Avengers. And if he wants to break bad again, what's more despicable than killing your best friend? Cable better get ready because his old friend Wade has him in the crosshairs.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------|----------------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | David Lopez | 1 | | Var | Secret Comic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan, Scott Koblish, Guru-eFX & Joe Sabino | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Deadpool Kills Cable - Part Two: "Waiting for Cable Installation"
ComicInfo.Tags: Deadpool Kills Cable,Time Variance Authority,Thor,Cable,Deadpool,Justice Peace
ComicInfo.Letterer: Joe Sabino,VC's Joe Sabino,VC's Joe Sabino
